item.description:
Join us for a Victorian Winter Celebration for FAMILIES!

FREE Event!


  • Take your own pictures with Santa Claus
  • Listen to concerts of holiday music by student musicians
  • Make Christmas and Winter crafts
  • Potluck dinner at 5:30pm
  • Family Christmas Caroling on the wraparound porch, 6pm-7pm
  • View children art work from CT Art School
  • Listen to dramatic readings of Twas the Night Before Christmas


Optional: Please bring a new pair of children or adult mittens for our charity mitten tree!

The MusicMakers Academy
at The Victorian
517 Hartford Road
Manchester
(860) 646-3096
http://www.musicmaker...
info@musicmakersacademy.com

group.name: The Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group

item.name: Victorian Winter Celebration
